LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Exalted.description: An aching body is to be revered. Nearly nothing is found more rewarding than a day of hard work.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Liked.label: liked
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Liked.description: Hard work is good for your body and for your mind.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Indifferent.label: indifferent
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Indifferent.description: Dumb tasks are necessary. That's all there is to it.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Disliked.label: disliked
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Disliked.description: We'd rather not do cleaning and hauling tasks, as they are incredibly exhausting, but they are necessary.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Horrible.description:
We should not suffer the laborious degradation of our bodies, nor the degradation of sweat forming on our brow.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Leader and Moralist roles will be incapable of Dumb Labor.
